messages.title: OUR CHANCE FOR CHANGE
messages.content: A No Deal Brexit is Bad for Mid Sussex.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Robert Eggleston and the Liberal Democrats will fight for better health services and to demand better housing developments in Mid Sussex.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Greener Future for Our Children
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Prioritising people over profit and environment.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A Fit for Purpose Social Care System
keyPolicies.policyDescription: No specific details provided on the leaflet.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Switch to back Lib Dems in Mid Sussex to beat the Conservatives. How Mid Sussex Voted in May 2019 shows Lib Dems 28%, Green 17%, Labour 10%, and Conservative 43%.

issues.brexitEurope: A No Deal Brexit is bad for Mid Sussex. Local Lib Dem MP to stop Brexit and fight for people's vote.
issues.environment: A Greener Future for Our Children by prioritising people, profit, and environment.
issues.health: Better Health Services, Better Homes policy and campaigning tirelessly for local NHS services.
issues.socialWelfare: A Fit for Purpose Social Care System.

housing.content: Demand better housing developments in Mid Sussex.

leaflet.personalStatement: Robert Eggleston knows Mid Sussex well, having lived there for 30 years, is a Mid Sussex District Councillor and is Leader of Burgess Hill Town Council.

politicalExperience.role: Leader of Burgess Hill Town Council

images.caption: Robert Eggleston will stand up for Mid Sussex
Graph showing voting percentages in Mid Sussex

leaflet.additionalNotes: Leaflet urges tactical voting to prevent a Conservative win in Mid Sussex.
